about_the_game:
This is currently the only game that uses poop to fight. After obtaining weapons, the left mouse button opens fire. If there are no weapons, the right mouse button opens fire. The left CTRL button is used to squat, the left SHIFT button is used to walk, the G button is used to discard weapons, the F button is used to transform when there are no weapons, the 1 and 2 buttons are used to switch weapons, and the R button is used to increase ammunition. After reaching the highest point, the game wins and ends. To create a server, you must first select a map, otherwise you cannot start the game

In the not-too-distant future, humans launched a war and exterminated most of themselves. The remaining humans were exposed to huge radiation and mutated. Their poop became their weapons, and they attacked each other until someone ascended the throne. Become the king of poop and put an end to this horror.

This is a combat shooting game, but it also has AI monsters. You can also create your own host to pass the level alone. The way to win is to defeat the enemy and reach the designated location.

1: Enter the game and create a server (be sure to select a map)

2: The operation is the same as other shooting games, the difference is that you can transform into poop by pressing "F"

3: Reach the top of the map and win

  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: intel core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320equivalent

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX-1080equivalent
